short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you make custom 'to/' links to sites you want to remember! Like bookmarks that your fingers remember to type ðŸ˜Š.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For example, if you're on an article you want to read later, save it as a "to/read" short-link. When you want to go back to it, just type "to/read" in your search bar and it should redirect you. 

You can add whatever short-link name you wantâ€”though they'll all begin with "to/".

Details:
- You can add up to 4000 short links in the extension 
- If you already use Go-links, this can work alongside that product since it uses a different prefix: "go/"
- This works entirely in your client and doesn't share data with external services. Feel free to inspect the source code at any time on Github: https://github.com/NaimKabir/personal-golinks
- This doesn't sync across devices, to minimize data shared beyond your client. If syncing across devices is something you'd prefer, please write into support
